attributes.action: Seal our borders against drugs, disease, illegal migration and preserve our nation's language, culture and heritage for the next generations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition needs to be signed by anyone who feels the current immigration influx is putting pressure on the country. Some of the most obvious pressures include the stretched services/infrastructure, overcorwding/housing leading to greenbelt building, drugs, terrorism/organised crime, changing every sign to accomodate 100 languages and a general loss of identity/culture, forcing people who have lived here for generations to leave to escape third world Britain that is fast looming.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
